short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A basketball themed background and current NBA games in a nice table for your chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change the background image on default tab to feature cool Basketball related images! The extension also provides users with a Custom Web Search and a table with the current season's NBA games and scores.

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Basketball Tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use https://basketballtab.com/terms and Policy https://basketballtab.com/privacy/

Free stock media content is distributed by Pixabay- https://pixabay.com
